short_description:
This very configurable script allows you to plot a 3D (MNI space) visualisation of a brain graph, with edges represented by cylinders and vertices represented by spheres. To aid orientation, a cortical mesh can be added, as can convex hull outlines. 

The colouring and sizing scheme is fully configurable for both edges and vertices.

You can see some example output in 

<http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22677149>
<http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20541019>
<http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24562717>
summary: Matlab code to visualise brain graphs from connectivity matrices
